name: The Prison Maze
description:
Prison Maze is a co-op puzzle game for 1-2 players with 28 puzzles of varying difficulty.

Make sure to read the controls before downloading

Objective

The objective of the game is to guide multiple characters from the start to finish while avoiding the traps hidden in the maze.

The problem? Each player only have one half of a controller to control the characters. Player 1 will control the vertical movement while Player 2 will control the horizontal movement. Switch between the characters, taking turns moving them to reach the goals.

The game is mainly made for 2 players sharing the controls but there is a single player mode where one player can control both players controls by switching between them.

Controls:

Keyboard:
Move left/right: Left/Right, A/D
Move up/down: Up/Down, W/S
Accept/Character 1: Num 1, Alpha 1
Back/Character 2: Num 2, Alpha 2
Character 3: Num 3, Alpha 3
Character 4: Num 4, Alpha 4
Interact: Right Ctrl, Left Ctrl
Pause: Enter, Tab
Switch player: Num Enter, Space

Gamepad:
Move left/right: Left stick
Move up/down: Left stick
Accept/Character 1: A
Back/Character 2: B
Character 3: X
Character 4: Y
Interact: RB
Pause: Options
Switch player: LB
